channel.title: Board Games on him.happyhippos
channel.description: Recent content in Board Games on him.happyhippos

item.title: Board games
item.description: If you’ve known me for any amount of time, you know that I’m a pretty huge fan of board games. Whenever we host almost anyone, the conversation almost inevitably turns to my giant cabinet filled with games. What is it about games that I enjoy so much? Part of it is the mental challenge of identifying the best line of play is. Another part is the fact that the options are limited.
